website_summaries.verdict: With its feminine lines, this tankini swimsuit wears like a swim dress with the convenience of a tankini.
pros: High-waisted, flirty top and bikini bottoms that offer plenty of coverage
The straps are adjustable, and the double-lined briefs don't go transparent in water
Available in three tropical prints that scream "vacation
cons: Not a wide variety of color options

customer_reviews.title: Nice, accurate colors and sizing- by seller
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tankini. The sizing is accurate from the seller ( not the Amazon sizing) Pretty colors match pics perfectly AND this tankini top is a nice, normal length. I personally dont like how store tankinis are designed for only short people. At 5'8 No one needs to see my muffin top, I dont want to see it either, and this is long enough to cover up my chubby torso!
customer_reviews.author: SooZeeQ

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and modest
customer_reviews.text: I'm here to sing more praises for this swimsuit. It's not the most flashy suit out there but it definitely gets the job done. It's modest and feminine (I was seeking modest) without being frumpy, and it still flatters my chest and gives me a waist. I did choose a different bottom to go with the top, as I prefer a high waisted retro style rather than a bikini style.
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for this tankini. Fits true to size, and the straps are adjustable. Great little swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gordon

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty swimsuit and good quality. I just ordered too big. They quickly approved my return and I am waiting on the refund.
customer_reviews.author: M. NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Good if you need something shapely.
customer_reviews.text: Helps camoflauge imperfections. Support in breast area seems like will be good, considering no wire. I wore on the beach. Didn't get in water so not sure on that. . .
customer_reviews.author: Chris Barclift

customer_reviews.title: Flattering fit!
customer_reviews.text: After searching for the longest, I finally found the perfect one. The top covers what it needs to and also looks flattering! If the bottom were shorts, it would have been the perfect modest bathing suit but it is still great! I ordered a swim shorts and I’m happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and modest
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 57 year old grandma. This is flattering and modest.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE Fits perfect! Fabric is thick and soft doesnt feel cheap! Best thing is the boob support lol
customer_reviews.author: brigirl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and modest!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Comfortable material and true to size!
customer_reviews.author: LFerguson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Fits 100% Like a Medium should. Ordered another one different color.
customer_reviews.author: tammy king

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect, looks great, and is super comfortable! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and flattering.
customer_reviews.text: It is really comfortable and modest. I would like to order another one but there is no more an extra large. Please bring back the extra large size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hotouch Tankini Swimsuits for Women Two Piece Bathing Suits Swimdress Printed Tankini Set S-XXL
feature_bullets: This trendy two pieces swimwear features stylish layered design which will surely make you look fab, together with removable padded cups inside.
Women 8 pieces stylish Double layered tankini set with brief. More colorsfor you choose: Black ,Wine Red and Navy Blue Printed
Skirt layers will perfectly hide your abdomen bulge, which will make you more charming in summer.
Occasion: Suitable for summer beachwear, Swimming Pool, Beach party, Pool wear, fashion swimsuit for women on vacation.
Colors and Sizes: We have 3 colors (Black/Wine Red/Navy Blue) and 5 sizes(S/M/L/XL/XXL) for this 2 pieces tankini set. Please according to size measurement to find the best size before you purchase.
